attr.title: Tomb Robo
attr.desc: A platformer-puzzler. Robo-hop n' roll  your way through each tricky stage! But beware, don't waste your jumps!
attr.inst: Download at itch.io https://d-eros.itch.io/tomb-robo and copy data.win and options.ini to assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://d-eros.itch.io/tomb-robo) and copy data.win and options.ini to assets folder.
